name: LightThunder
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: light thunder
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Light Thunder lets you hear white noise that can help you stay focused, relax and cover up annoying noises.

HOW TO USE:
To Get Started: Say "Alexa open Light Thunder"
To Get Next Sound: Say "Alexa Next"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
